/** This file is major component of this plugin so please don't try to edit here. */
#rmp_menu_trigger-1965 {
  width: 55px;
  height: 55px;
  position: fixed;
  top: 15px;
  border-radius: 5px;
  display: none;
  text-decoration: none;
  right: 5%;
  background: transparent;
  transition: transform 0.5s, background-color 0.5s;
}
#rmp_menu_trigger-1965 .rmp-trigger-box {
  width: 25px;
  color: #ffffff;
}
#rmp_menu_trigger-1965 .rmp-trigger-icon-active, #rmp_menu_trigger-1965 .rmp-trigger-text-open {
  display: none;
}
#rmp_menu_trigger-1965.is-active .rmp-trigger-icon-active, #rmp_menu_trigger-1965.is-active .rmp-trigger-text-open {
  display: inline;
}
#rmp_menu_trigger-1965.is-active .rmp-trigger-icon-inactive, #rmp_menu_trigger-1965.is-active .rmp-trigger-text {
  display: none;
}
#rmp_menu_trigger-1965 .rmp-trigger-label {
  color: #ffffff;
  pointer-events: none;
  line-height: 13px;
  font-family: inherit;
  font-size: 14px;
  display: inline;
  text-transform: inherit;
}
#rmp_menu_trigger-1965 .rmp-trigger-label.rmp-trigger-label-top {
  display: block;
  margin-bottom: 12px;
}
#rmp_menu_trigger-1965 .rmp-trigger-label.rmp-trigger-label-bottom {
  display: block;
  margin-top: 12px;
}
#rmp_menu_trigger-1965 .responsive-menu-pro-inner {
  display: block;
}
#rmp_menu_trigger-1965 .rmp-trigger-icon-inactive .rmp-font-icon {

<div class="site-inner-body">
<h1>The Boutique Real Estate Experience</h1>
<div style="text-align: center;">Boutique firms are specialized businesses with a culture centered on personalized customer service. As a client of Styer Real Estate, you will experience best-in-town expertise, outstanding communication, and stellar representation, with customized services tailored to your unique needs. You can relax knowing that not only your agent, but the entire office is working to assist you for a smooth and skilled transaction.</div>
</div>
<div class="testimonial">
<h5>“From the welcoming, homey feel of the office to the knowledgeable, proactive, and responsive nature of every single person on the Styer Team, I could not have been more pleased. Everyone with whom I interacted was dedicated to making sure I understood and was prepared for every step of the home selling and buying practice. They are awesome to work with!”</h5>
</div>
<div class="site-inner-body">
<h1>Our Mission & Values</h1>
<p>Our goal is to cultivate an environment where honest, like-minded professionals are motivated to exceed expectations, create an unbeatable service experience, stay educated and engaged, operate with the client’s best interest at heart, and build meaningful relationships. In short … we aim to do good, both in our work environment and in the community we serve.</p>
<div class="section group">
<div class="col span_1_of_3">
<p><img loading="lazy" decoding="async" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-45" src="https://www.styerrealestate.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/KenandMeredith.jpg" alt="" width="600" height="899" srcset="https://styerrealestate.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/KenandMeredith.jpg 600w, https://styerrealestate.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/KenandMeredith-200x300.jpg 200w, https://styerrealestate.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/KenandMeredith-217x325.jpg 217w" sizes="auto, (max-width: 600px) 100vw, 600px" /></p>
<h6>The Styer Difference</h6>
<p>Styer Real Estate is a family-run business that focuses on recruiting full-time, quality REALTORS that understand the local market conditions and are dedicated to tending to individual client needs. Instead of focusing on the number of homes we sell, we are focused on serving the clients we have at the highest level.<br />
<a href="https://www.styerrealestate.com/about/"></p>
<div class="button">About us</div>
<p></a>
</div>
<div class="col span_2_of_3">
<p><img loading="lazy" decoding="async" src="https://www.styerrealestate.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/sold-3.jpg" alt="Buying with Styer Real Estate" width="600" height="900" class="alignleft size-full wp-image-589" srcset="https://styerrealestate.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/sold-3.jpg 600w, https://styerrealestate.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/sold-3-200x300.jpg 200w, https://styerrealestate.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/sold-3-217x325.jpg 217w" sizes="auto, (max-width: 600px) 100vw, 600px" /></p>
<h6>BUYING WITH STYER</h6>
<p>Buying a home is often times the biggest purchase a person or family will ever make and can be a serious, life-changing decision. The best — and least stressful — way to purchase a home is to be well educated throughout the process, and the best way to be educated is to work with a Styer Real Estate professional to guide you step-by-step.<br />
<a href="https://www.styerrealestate.com/buying/"></p>
<div class="button">Buying</div>
<p></a>
</div>
<div class="col span_3_of_3">

<h6>SELLING WITH STYER</h6>
<p>Every home is unique and requires individualized marketing and attention. That’s why Styer Real Estate agents create customized experiences for every transaction. Whether you’re selling a sprawling estate, fixer-upper, or anything in between, you can expect the same level of service from one of our local experts.<br />
<a href="https://www.styerrealestate.com/selling/"></p>
